page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE - a weekday
page.content: {Wednesday 24th April 1985} My Sister Sasha, Brother Tim, my Mum, Dad and I, live in a brick house with twelve rooms. We have a big garden where we plant vegetables and flowers. I go to bed at 8.30pm, Sasha goes at 9.00pm, Tim goes at 7.00pm, and my parents go at 11.00pm. We all get up at 7.00am. My Dad goes to work at 8.00am. He is a Quantity Surveyor, making houses, shops and flats. His office is in Wolvey, taking 15 minutes by car. Mum takes Tim to playschool and swimming club today. Sasha and I go to school and work hard. After school we have choir practice for a concert at DeMontfort Hall, Leicester, and a violin lesson in Hinckley, arriving home at 6.00pm for tea. After tea I read and play with Sasha until bedtime. {By Kelly Pool. Age 7.}
